{{Wireless embedded system |brand=8devices |model=Carambola |revision= |asin= |fcc_date=12/06/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=mini module |fcc_id=Z9W-CM1 |pwr_v=3.3 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3050 |cpu1_cspeed=320 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV640ETTI-70G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9825G6JH-61 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 (pins - req. breakout) |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3050 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=I2C, SPI, GPIO, I2S, |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=C4:93:00 |oui_eth=C4:93:00 }} {{TagLine|Easily embeddable wireless module}} :[http://8devices.com/carambola Product page] {{â€¢}} [http://8devices.com/media/files/Carambola.pdf Datasheet] *[http://8devices.com/wiki_carambola/doku.php '''8devices''' '''''Carambola Wiki''''']
*[https://github.com/8devices/carambola '''8devices''' github repo for their '''OpenWrt''' build] Additional specifications, per '''8devices''' product page and datasheet, follow... :*Size: 35 mm x 45 mm :*Power supply: 3.3V single voltage :*Maximum power consumption: 1.5 W :*LEDs: Power, Ethernet0, Ethernet1, WLAN; all are green
